classic.name: Kopiec Józefa Piłsudskiego
classic.description: Mound built in honor of statesman Józef Piłsudski with walking paths leading to views over the city.

classic.name: Rynek Główny
classic.description: Large medieval town square, dating to the 13th century, surrounded by palaces & churches.

classic.name: St. Mary's Basilica
classic.description: Roman Catholic basilica with a carved altarpiece & hourly trumpet calls from the Gothic watchtower.

classic.name: Czartoryski Museum
classic.description: Museum founded in 1801, exhibiting artworks & handicrafts, including a painting by Da Vinci.

classic.name: Krakus Mound
classic.description: This large mound of unknown origin is a popular destination for scenic views of the city.

classic.name: Wawel Royal Castle-State Art Collection
classic.description: Fortified hilltop castle, initiated in the 14th century & prettified in a variety of later styles.

classic.name: Kopiec Kościuszki
classic.description: Artificial mound built in 1820 to commemorate Tadeusz Kosciuszko, a military hero.

classic.name: MNK Sukiennice
classic.description: Renaissance-style market arcade with 13th-century origins & a 19th-century Polish art museum.

foodie.name: Tociekawa Specialty Coffee
foodie.description: Laid-back coffee shop dispensing a variety of hot & cold drinks, plus cakes & snacks.

foodie.name: Mirror Bistro - Pierogi Bystro
foodie.description: Cozy restaurant offering traditional dumplings & local plates, plus outdoor dining.

foodie.name: Morskie Oko
foodie.description: Polish dining amid exposed brickwork & chunky wooden furniture, plus concerts by highlands singers.

foodie.name: Kino Kijów
foodie.description: Movie house screening films but also live opera, dance & cabaret, with a film club & a cafe.

foodie.name: Restauracja Smakołyki
foodie.description: Casual, light-filled Polish restaurant serving familiar fare such as pierogi & hearty goulash.

adventure.name: Kopiec Józefa Piłsudskiego
adventure.description: Mound built in honor of statesman Józef Piłsudski with walking paths leading to views over the city.

adventure.name: Tyniec Forest
adventure.description: Forest trails from a riverside Benedictine abbey pass meadows, viewpoints & a WWII memorial.

adventure.name: Henryk Jordan Park
adventure.description: English-style gardens with sports areas, a pond & several monuments to famous Poles, plus bike hire.

adventure.name: Park im.Wojciecha Bednarskiego w Podgórzu
adventure.description: Serene natural landscape featuring a playground, walking paths & many species of trees.

adventure.name: Bielańsko-Tyniecki Landscape Park
adventure.description: Huge area of protected forest with outdoor recreation & historic buildings, including 2 monasteries.

adventure.name: Park Zaczarowanej Dorożki w Krakowie
adventure.description: Compact green space with walking paths branching out from a fountain, ball courts & a duck pond.

adventure.name: Planty
adventure.description: 4km chain of gardens with walkways, trees & lawns encircling the historic centre of Kraków.

adventure.name: Polish Airmen Park
adventure.description: Vast, wooded park, with playgrounds, a skate park &  a network of paved paths for running & cycling.

adventure.name: Krowoderski Park
adventure.description: Soccer, volleyball & shady jogging paths in a popular green space with a cafe & an ice cream shop.

cultural.name: Czartoryski Museum
cultural.description: Museum founded in 1801, exhibiting artworks & handicrafts, including a painting by Da Vinci.

cultural.name: Juliusz Słowacki Theatre
cultural.description: Historic 19th-century venue staging concerts, theatrical performances & other events.

cultural.name: Theater Scena STU
cultural.description: Well-known repertory venue that began life as a student venue & now hosts avant-garde performances.

cultural.name: Wawel Royal Castle-State Art Collection
cultural.description: Fortified hilltop castle, initiated in the 14th century & prettified in a variety of later styles.

cultural.name: Kopiec Kościuszki
cultural.description: Artificial mound built in 1820 to commemorate Tadeusz Kosciuszko, a military hero.

cultural.name: MNK Sukiennice
cultural.description: Renaissance-style market arcade with 13th-century origins & a 19th-century Polish art museum.

cultural.name: Muzeum Lotnictwa Polskiego
cultural.description: Air museum on an old airfield displaying planes & helicopters, plus a modern visitor center.
cultural.address: al. Jana Pawła II 39, 31-864 Kraków, Poland

cultural.name: Bagatela Theatre
cultural.description: Fairly intimate repertory theater with a varied program including comedy, plus an on-site bar.

relaxation.name: Henryk Jordan Park
relaxation.description: English-style gardens with sports areas, a pond & several monuments to famous Poles, plus bike hire.

relaxation.name: Park im.Wojciecha Bednarskiego w Podgórzu
relaxation.description: Serene natural landscape featuring a playground, walking paths & many species of trees.

relaxation.name: Planty
relaxation.description: 4km chain of gardens with walkways, trees & lawns encircling the historic centre of Kraków.

relaxation.name: Polish Airmen Park
relaxation.description: Vast, wooded park, with playgrounds, a skate park &  a network of paved paths for running & cycling.

relaxation.name: Krowoderski Park
relaxation.description: Soccer, volleyball & shady jogging paths in a popular green space with a cafe & an ice cream shop.

relaxation.name: Botanical Garden of the Jagiellonian University
relaxation.description: 1000s of plant species from orchids to carnivorous plants in 18th-century gardens & glasshouses.

relaxation.name: DoubleTree by Hilton Kraków Hotel & Convention Center
relaxation.description: Refined lodging with a restaurant & a bar, as well as an indoor pool & a fitness center.

relaxation.name: Qubus Hotel Kraków
relaxation.description: Relaxed quarters in a low-key hotel featuring an airy restaurant, an indoor pool & river views.

relaxation.name: Hotel Galaxy
relaxation.description: Polished hotel offering contemporary rooms, plus a spa, an indoor pool & a bright restaurant.

nightlife.name: Tociekawa Specialty Coffee
nightlife.description: Laid-back coffee shop dispensing a variety of hot & cold drinks, plus cakes & snacks.

nightlife.name: Piwnica Pod Baranami
nightlife.description: Venue for literary cabaret established in the 1950s, hosting jazz, poetry & surrealist comedy.
nightlife.address: Pałac Pod Baranami, Rynek Główny 27, 31-010 Kraków, Poland

nightlife.name: Cosmic Minigolf Pub
nightlife.description: Space-themed mini-golf course with 9 glow-in-the-dark holes, plus neon Jenga, arcade games & drinks.

nightlife.name: Holiday Inn Krakow City Centre by IHG
nightlife.description: Relaxed rooms & suites in a low-key hotel offering Mediterranean dining, a lobby bar & a gym.

nightlife.name: Chimera
nightlife.description: Polish restaurant in gothic setting, with meats roasted on a fireplace & decor by the artist-owner.

trendy.name: Tociekawa Specialty Coffee
trendy.description: Laid-back coffee shop dispensing a variety of hot & cold drinks, plus cakes & snacks.

trendy.name: Mirror Bistro - Pierogi Bystro
trendy.description: Cozy restaurant offering traditional dumplings & local plates, plus outdoor dining.

trendy.name: Kino Kijów
trendy.description: Movie house screening films but also live opera, dance & cabaret, with a film club & a cafe.

trendy.name: Restauracja Smakołyki
trendy.description: Casual, light-filled Polish restaurant serving familiar fare such as pierogi & hearty goulash.

trendy.name: HEVRE | Bar & Restaurant
trendy.description: Bar & kitchen in a former synagogue offering food, beer & cocktails in a classy, vintage atmosphere.

trendy.name: Alchemia
trendy.description: Casual place for a seasonal menu of international dishes & drinks, with vegan & vegetarian options.

trendy.name: Moja Café & Bistro
trendy.description: Laid-back hangout serving breakfast, sandwiches, soups & pasta dishes, plus desserts, coffee & wine.
